entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low zero.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to 600 metres overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
